mapper.select: select * from BOOK where PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} and USER_ID=#{userId} and TIME = #{time};
select * from BOOK where USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY TIME DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK (PRODUCT_ID, USER_ID, TIME, AMOUNT, ADDRESS, PAYMENT_METHODS, NOTE) VALUES (#{productId}, #{userId}, #{time}, #{amount}, #{address}, #{paymentMethods}, #{note});

INSERT INTO BOOK (PRODUCT_ID, USER_ID, TIME, AMOUNT, ADDRESS, PAYMENT_METHODS, NOTE, PRICE, TOTAL, PHONE) VALUES (#{productId}, #{userId}, #{time}, #{amount}, #{address}, #{paymentMethods}, #{note}, #{price}, #{total}, #{phone});
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOOK WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} and USER_ID=#{userId} and TIME = #{time};
mapper.select: SELECT b.*,p.NAME, p.UNIT, p.PRICE, u.NAME USERNAME from PRODUCT as p, BOOK as b, USER as u where p.PRODUCT_ID = b.PRODUCT_ID and b.USER_ID = u.USER_ID and (u.NAME LIKE #{pattern} OR p.NAME LIKE #{pattern}) ORDER BY b.TIME DESC;
